title: Projects
subtitle: These are some of the projects I have worked on. Each one has been an opportunity to learn new technologies, strengthen my skills, and apply them to build innovative and functional solutions.

projectsList.title: Piranha Planner – Landing Page
projectsList.description: A modern and fully responsive landing page built with React and Vite to showcase the core features of Piranha Planner.

projectsList.title: Piranha Planner
projectsList.description: A collaborative task management platform built with React and Supabase. It includes user authentication, task sharing, comments, file uploads, messaging, notifications, and productivity analytics.

projectsList.title: Mobility Management System — Administrative Platform
projectsList.description: Professional web platform built with Angular for managing mobility and traffic-related processes. I worked as the frontend developer, implementing all UI screens, navigation, reusable components, forms, and API integration. The system includes modules for traffic ticket management, auditing, devices, PDF report generation, user administration, and a general dashboard. Developed using a modular architecture, centralized services, and custom styling with pure CSS.

projectsList.title: Medical Appointment Management
projectsList.description: A planned web application designed to efficiently manage medical appointments. It will include authentication and role-based access control (administrator, doctor, patient), consultation scheduling, medical history tracking, notifications, and personalized dashboards for each user type. The frontend will be developed with React and the backend with Spring Boot, following fullstack best practices with a focus on security, usability, and scalability.
